title: [Gameplay] Ward from trinket has attack speed?
body: Recently, I noticed that ward from trinket has attack speed on it (0.63). I thought this would go away after new patch (5.22), however the trinket ward still has attack speed on it. Does anyone else encounter this type of issue before or is my computer going nuts?

replies.body: Don't remove the attack speed on the ward! It doesn't do anything, and its kinda funny!

Hey TheGreatDon5,

Thanks for the report! This is definitely a bug and not something that's a problem with just your computer. :P We'll see what's going on here.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kTxEgYmE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-13T17:37:19.548+0000)
>
> Hey TheGreatDon5,
> 
> Thanks for the report! This is definitely a bug and not something that's a problem with just your computer. :P We'll see what's going on here.

why are you posting on this thread and not the others with like 100 up-votes? No one likes the new patch can you please do something about this?

Hi!

I'm posting on the threads that are within the realm of my expertise, which is skins! 

All of the teams are scrolling through the bug reports and looking into everything being reported. We're working to resolve the major issues as soon as possible. 

We're currently in the preseason which means that things won't be perfect due to all of the changes being put out, but we're actively monitoring bugs and feedback! ^-^
#Don't nerf Warrior Ward, for he fights for our future with his 0.63 AS.
